name: Stack & LinkedList Game
description:
Credits:

Alan Harris: Programming, Art

Tyler Hodzen: Programming, Art

  • Music:
    • The Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild Horse Riding Day
      • The song that plays for the Stack game.
    • Sombrilla by Phillip Gross
      • The song that plays for the LinkedList game
    • Shadow of a Dark Queen by Damnation Reign
      • The song that plays in the Main Menu
  • Sound Effects:
    • “Wow”
      • Parodius! From Myth to Laughter
    • “Nope”
      • Team Fortress 2
  • Font:
    • AmazDooMLeft
Controls:

~~~Stack Game~~~

WSAD: Movement

Space: Activate Obstacles

~~~LinkedList Game~~~

A and D: Movement

Space: Jump

Shift: Move Nodes (when needed)
